tasks.label: check-frontend-spec
args: const path=require("path"); const file=process.env.VSCODE_FILE||""; const root=process.env.WORKSPACE||""; const rel=path.relative(root,file).split(path.sep).join("/"); if(!/^frontend\/.*\.spec\.ts$/.test(rel)){ console.error("Open a *.spec.ts file inside /frontend from repo root"); process.exit(1); }
